title: Best Of David Bowie RINGTONES (Big Papi) iPhone+Android
description:
These are ringtones for Android and iPhone, which means each track is a snippet of the full song. As a smarty pants pointed out, the MP3 Android ringtones will also work for those with Windows-based mobiles. BlackBerry too!

Big Papi is new at making ringtones so if you have any suggestions please let Big Papi know.

- Big Papi

BlackBerry users, place the ringtones in the Blackberry/Ringtones folder. You may need to reboot (remove battery) to see the tones in your ringtone list

For iPhone users import the m4r files into your iTunes ringtone area then sync the phone.

For Android users you may want to create a "ringtone" folder so these don't get mixed up with full songs. The folder should already be there by default.


---------------------------------------------------------------------
